name: Padding
description: In not more than **24 characters**, write a function named `p` that pads it input to both sides of itself and returns the result. ## Example 1. `p("e")` //returns "eee" 2. `p("e\n")` //returns "e\ne\ne\n" ## Instruction 1. Code should not the more than 24 characters 2. Character `+` and function `repeat` not allowed in the code. 3. Only a single `.` character allowed 4. Code must be on a single line 5. ${ character not allowed
